name: Game Of Life (itch) (User987)
description:
A recreation of Conway's Game Of Life. 

Game of life is a cellular automata which has a grid of cells with two states. Cells can either be on or off depending on their neighbouring cells. For more information about the rules, I would highly recommend visiting this Wikipedia page:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life#Rules

Controls:

Left mouse click - Place cell.

Right mouse click - Remove cell.

Up arrow - Speed up time.

Down arrow - Slow down time.

R key - Reset grid.

Space key - Pause/Unpause.

Escape - Close application.
